name: Special Modifications (V)
Lore: 'Han''s ''special modifications'' for the Millennium Falcon included security mechanisms, deflector shields, hull plating, faster hyperdrive and enhanced weapons.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  If your starship in battle is about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead lost at end of battle (if forfeited, forfeit for 0).  May place this Effect in Lost Pile to make your starship immune to attrition for remainder of turn. (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
